entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 6:03AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOW FOR WEDNESDAY... A weather front will lift north Wednesday and bring significant snow across the Lower Yukon Valley east to the Upper Kuskokwim Valley.
